# CreateRefundRequest



**Properties**

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| :-------- | :----------| :----------| :----------|
    | paymentId | string | ✅ | The unique identifier of the payment to be refunded. |
    | reason | string | ❌ | The reason for the refund, if any. Maximum length is 3000 characters. Optional. |
